#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,x=1,n;
    char s[100010];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(x<=t)
    {
               scanf("%d",&n);
               char ch=getchar();
               scanf("%s",s);
               int i=0,counts=0,countc=0,games=0,gamec=0;
               while(i<n)
               {
                         if(s[i]=='S')
                         {
                                      counts++;
                                      i++;
                         }
                         else
                         {
                             countc++;
                             i++;
                         }
                         if(counts==4)
                         {
                                      games++;
                                      counts=countc=0;
                         }
                         else if(countc==4)
                         {
                              gamec++;
                              counts=countc=0;
                         }
               }
               printf("%d-%d",games,gamec);
               if(counts!=0||countc!=0)
               {
                                       switch(counts)
                                       {
                                                     case 0:printf(",%d-",0);break;
                                                      case 1:printf(",%d-",15);break;
                                                       case 2:printf(",%d-",30);break;
                                                        case 3:printf(",%d-",40);break;
                                       }
                                       switch(countc)
                                       {
                                                     case 0:printf("%d\n",0);break;
                                                     case 1:printf("%d\n",15);break;
                                                     case 2:printf("%d\n",30);break;
                                                     case 3:printf("%d\n",40);break;
                                       }
               }
               else
               {
                   printf("\n");
               }
               x++;
    }
    //getch();
    return(0);
}
